entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
